title: Pixel 3XL, since upgrading to android v10, screen goes blank during phonecalls
content:
Since upgrading my Pixel3xl to android v10 about a month ago, My screen goes blank during phonecalls. It means that I am unable to use my screen during phonecalls and need to use the power button to end call option to finish calls. 

I have downloaded the sensor test and found that it reads 0cm in all conditions which means the problem is likely being caused by this. I would like to state that this issue started directly after the update, which makes me unsure if the issue is hardware or software.

I have tried hard reset, safe mode (issue persists) but have not tried factory reset as I don't particularly want to do this.
